EmailTemplate.name: Aerowave Minutes Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} You should have recently received the minutes reminder notification shown below:
{!Case.Description}
We are following up to see if you would like to add additional minutes to your service. Please reply with your authorization to update the minutes and we will contact you to obtain your credit card details.
Current Pricing: AeroWave Data Plan – 3000 minutes $1,999.00 Voice Plan – 120 minutes $176.40
If you no longer require Aerowave service, please reply and let us know so we may take the necessary actions to update your account. Please include your {!Case.CaseNumber} when sending your reply.
As a reminder, you can use the Aerowave portal site to review your usage, view your purchase history, update your email information and view minutes/calendar thresholds for the assigned tail number.
Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
If you have any questions or need further assistance, please reply to fssaccounts@honeywell.com or call: 425-885-8100-Option 6 or 888-634-3330-Option 6
